entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NotNullIfNotNull also requires casting to non-nullable type for valuetypes #71728
  • EditorConfig parsing doesn't match spec #71727
    17.10
  • Gracefully handle misplaced `!` token after type names #71723
  • Collection expression spreads on arrays can result in variance exceptions #71720
    17.10
  • IDE0060 false positive with [EnumeratorCancellation] attribute #71719
  • Extract Interface / Pull Up should remove [Enumeratorancellation] attributes #71718
  • IDE0059 triggered incorrectly, removing assignment would break functionality #71717
    Backlog

Closed

  • Invalid IL generated for intercepted callsite #70841
    17.10
  • Action Command implementation under C# 8 #71463
  • Compilation failed with an explicit event block and primary constructor #71669

PullRequests

Created

  • Another attempt at getting TelemetryLogger working in VSCode #71734
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to MicroBuildSigningPlugin V3 #71715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2357931 #71732
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • TelemetryLogging.Log* methods should be calling free on the passed in KeyValueLogMessage #71608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move projects to different directories #71700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix intercepting a struct or enum base method #71655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #70170 from mgoertz-msft/dev/mgoertz/xaml-… #71726
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2357820 #71729
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2356551 #71685
  • Fixing typos #71722
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Mac crash dumps #71706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider to use IProjectTree/ProjectTreeFlags #71664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Revert deadlock mitigation that causes other deadlocks #71713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
